root.name: Amazing Penguin
root.description: OverviewAmazing Penguin is an action game developed and published by Natsume for the Game Boy platform.GameplayAmazing Penguin takes place on a grid in which the player, who takes control of a penguin must walk across the lines collecting dots and circles with minus symbols in them. There are enemies that must be avoided and can be defeated by kicking the dots at them.
